main.name: Jeremy Cantwell

main.bio: Dedicated to learning and growing. Many years of customer services to back up web designing background. Enjoy mountain biking, poetry, and philosophy in my spare time along with the occassional video game.

education.description: Study to learn JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, Materialize, Node.js, Express.js, MySql, Mongo.js, and React.js. Furthermore learning Agile and Scrum methodologies.  .
